name: Ext_R4B_PackagedProductDefinition_characteristic
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PackagedProductDefinition|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Allows the key features to be recorded, such as "hospital pack", "nurse prescribable"
element.definition: Allows the key features to be recorded, such as "hospital pack", "nurse prescribable", "calendar pack".
element.comment: `PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic` maps to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
